blog.name: alanspazzaliartist
blog.title: Alan Spazzali Artist
blog.description: Artist abstract surreal, employing mixed media with​ the benefit of digital technology

summary: The trivialization of the digital fact since the 1990s has structurally affected our modes of consumption, our communication...
caption:
The trivialization of the digital fact since the 1990s has structurally affected our modes of consumption, our communication habits, our relational approaches.

The impact is such that no field seems to be spared, not even visual art. My aim is to study the relationship between new technologies and artistic production around four major themes: Internet flow, state surveillance, hybrid bodies, and the virtual world.

“Hybrid Me”

© Alan Spazzali

reblog.comment:

Born: 08/12/1992
Published Canadian Cartoonist - Freelancer for hire!
Currently lives in Yellowknife, Canada - For job related inquiries; contact me at: myles.fontana@gmail.com
-
Studied @ Algonquin College for the Illustration & Concept Art Program Fall 2016
-
Graduated w/ honours from the

summary: This was supposed to be a part of a secret santa back on a (now defunct discord server) for @ ducknpluck but I REALLY wanted to...
caption:
This was supposed to be a part of a secret santa back on a (now defunct discord server) for @ ducknpluck but I REALLY wanted to do something more than I usually put out. On and off this project for a while, sadly but it’s done now.

Read Duck’s “Endless Summer Syndrome”; it’s gonna be COOL

summary: The Artwork That Traps Ivanka Trump in an Endless Cleanup Task
title: The Artwork That Traps Ivanka Trump in an Endless Cleanup Task
body: An art installation on view in Washington, D.C., imagines the powerful White House adviser Ivanka … Contemporary artists love to hate the Trump administration, and plenty of them have subjected the president to pointed caricature.

reblog.comment: An art installation on view in Washington, D.C., imagines the powerful White House adviser Ivanka … Contemporary artists love to hate the Trump administration, and plenty of them have subjected the president to pointed caricature.

summary: Any Art Communities on Tumblr I Can Join
title: Any Art Communities on Tumblr I Can Join
body:
Hey, I want to join some artist communities on social media but am having a hard time finding them since social media is not my strong suit.

I want to build myself as an artist, but I know that it is a fruitless task to do on my own. 

Does anyone have any suggestions?

blog.name: surferofrowdybliss
blog.title: Visual Play
blog.description:
Deborah Coulter

Scissors in hand, I make collages exploring the freedom and fun of visual play. I get lost in the joy of selecting, cutting, and rearranging images. The process begins as I discover the infinite possibilities life offers through the spaciousness of an open heart. Children, animals, and nature lead the way.

I invite you to join me in these adventures of scissors & glue blending with imagination in the exquisite present.

https://instagram.com/deborahcoulterartflow/

http://society6.com/deborahcoulter

Just a little thing I decided to do♡
I'm getting the hang of animation, so hopefully I can add them to my commission list...
body:
Just a little thing I decided to do♡

I’m getting the hang of animation, so hopefully I can add them to my commission list someday soon.

That being said-

Make sure you guys, artist, gamers, bloggers and anyone else whose faced off w/ the beast that is stress.

Take care of yourselves.

tags: the liar princess and the blind prince
i gave the princess more of a backstory in the au than in the game
because she might get more important role in the future ;) ;)
also  the Protagonist from night alone made her outfit
she didn’t wear a dress underwater
that’s not how clothing works underwater
summary:
I decided to name the princess “Viola”. Although “Olympia” was a good name as well (I used it for her wolf form). 
Viola in this...
body:
Pirate AU-Liar Princess, “Viola”, or “Olympia”. (Backstory)

I decided to name the princess “Viola”. Although “Olympia” was a good name as well (I used it for her wolf form).

Viola in this AU is a siren (Unlike Rose and Blanc Who are half mermaids, probably cursed). Her left fin has been ripped, evidence of some sort of struggle.

She actually has a backstory, unlike her canon counterpart. (I’ll refer to her both as Olympia and Viola)

When Olympia was just a baby, she and her mother sat on a rock and sing to the moon. Olympia wasn’t good at singing back then.

One day, when Olympia was 13, she was approached by a shark-siren and was asked to follow them to an abandoned part of the reef.

She shouldn’t have trusted them.

She was captured by humans for research. One day, she jumped off the ship to escape back to the ocean, but she was followed by a human who was commissioned to return any escaped specimen. While struggling, she lost part of her fin.

She snapped.

She slashed at the attacker, leaving a scar on their arm. Looking at her claw, she swam away. But she didn’t know where she was.

She was lost at sea.

Olympia was swimming through the ocean, when she noticed a ship sailing above her. She spied on it, noticing that it was sailed by children. She noticed a prince that looked the same age as her. He was sitting at the edge of the rail, when the others on the ship screamed; he fell off!! Olympia swam underwater to save him.

With the prince in her arms, she didn’t know how to bring him up to the surface without them seeing that she was a siren. She didn’t have to, though, because a net scooped the two up and lifted the young ones up onto the deck.

Olympia was then nicknamed “Viola”.

With Viola on the ship, she became part of the crew. She became close with the prince, who she learned was blind. She taught Rose and Blanc how to use their voices to lure “monsters” (She reached her potential at 14). She doesn’t trust the others as much, though. You don’t know if that lovely fascination will turn into horrible research.
